personal_info.headline: COO at EIWA
personal_info.name: Marcelo M. Rolandelli
personal_info.summary: Marcelo has over 25 years experience from upper management positions in Technology (IBM Corporate HQ in New York), Software as a Service (SaaS) Supply Chain startup/Nasdaq IPO in Sillicon Valley (E2open) and Natural Resources Solutions & Services (Flowserve Corporation / Mincom Inc.). Management responsibilities with global scope included leading IBM Supply Chain Strategy and Business Development of new ventures at Corporate level and with select Global Industrial Sector clients. Natural Resources Services expertise included Regional Management of Latin American Operations at both Flowserve Corporation Sealing Fluids Division HQ and Mincom Inc. Strategic Asset Management Technology Solutions for Oil & Gas, Energy and Mining key Latin America clients. An Industrial Engineer with Masters degrees from Buenos Aires Institute of Technology (ITBA) and University of Michigan (Ann Arbor), Marcelo began his career in Buenos Aires and quickly moved to the USA in 1988. Following extended professional experience all USA based and with multiple International Europe and Asia Pacific involvements, Marcelo has recently relocated to Argentina to focus on US IT investments strategic advising, cloud computing, renewable energies and technology (cloud & AgTech) startups business development.
